meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, Council Chambers and virtual

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes of the December 12, 2024, meeting of the Ad Hoc Committee on Administrative Affairs.

agenda_items.title: Deliberate City Manager Candidates
agenda_items.description: Deliberate the qualifications of candidates for the city manager position provided by Baker Tilly and recommend a list of final candidates to be considered by city council. (The committee may deliberate the qualifications of candidates for the city manager position in closed session pursuant to Section 551.074 T.O.M.A.)
